channel.title: Problem with Portfowardin Or Sum1thn!BUT PLS HELP ME! :/ Description with PICS!
channel.description:
Hello , i got an problem with port fowarding or idk with what -.- I maked pics with my things and all should work but just CANT get it :/
Picture 1:
Ports are not closed .
[IMG]http://i32.tinypic.com/whku35.jpg[/img]
Picture 2:
No-Ip running , and ul see my Ip Config here so u can later see does i have all doned correctly .
[IMG]http://i25.tinypic.com/apjii8.jpg[/img]
Picture 3:
FireWall Doesn't block my Port .
[IMG]http://i30.tinypic.com/kbrdhe.jpg[/img]
Picture 4:
Thats my Local Area Network pic , here should be all fine also ..
[IMG]http://i32.tinypic.com/a5y4p.jpg[/img]
Picture 5:
Thats is now my router . I also called to service to ask whats the problem . But they told that i got all ports open and fine and i got it . And here should be all fine also .. But idk whats the problem ..
[IMG]http://i32.tinypic.com/9t07ky.jpg[/img]
Picture 6:
And that's it . Just doesn't let me in . My no - ip is running , my both firewalls are down , ports are opened , and i think i have been doned all correctly .. BUT NOTHING :(
[IMG]http://i28.tinypic.com/t98t9d.jpg[/img]
[b]Please somebody help me out :( ,It taked awhile to make this description + It's an Official Private servers forums , and if don't get help from here , then idk what do to . But il hope the best ;) [/b]
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 05, 2008, 10:23:08 AM[/size][hr]w00t , got got SERVER UP!
And guess what the problem was ? I needed to add the moparscape client into my source folder LMAOOOO !
But anyway , this forum is bretty lame . Because here is full of smart guys and noone are EVEN bothering to help ..
But anyways thanks to Laurenz ( Belgian Pk3r ) Who helped me out :)

item.title: Problem with Portfowardin Or Sum1thn!BUT PLS HELP ME! :/ Description with PICS!
item.dc:creator: @Defenz0r Defenz0r
item.description:
@Defenz0r wrote:

Hello , i got an problem with port fowarding or idk with what -.-
I maked pics with my things and all should work but just CANT get it

Picture 1:

Ports are not closed .

whku35.jpg800×600

Picture 2:

No-Ip running , and ul see my Ip Config here so u can later see does i have all doned correctly .

apjii8.jpg800×600

Picture 3:

FireWall Doesn’t block my Port .

kbrdhe.jpg800×600

Picture 4:

Thats my Local Area Network pic , here should be all fine also …

Picture 5:

Thats is now my router . I also called to service to ask whats the problem . But they told that i got all ports open and fine and i got it . And here should be all fine also … But idk whats the problem …

Picture 6:

And that’s it . Just doesn’t let me in . My no - ip is running , my both firewalls are down , ports are opened , and i think i have been doned all correctly … BUT NOTHING

t98t9d.jpg800×600

Please somebody help me out ,It taked awhile to make this description + It’s an Official Private servers forums , and if don’t get help from here , then idk what do to . But il hope the best

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 05, 2008, 10:23:08 AM[/size][hr]w00t , got got SERVER UP!

And guess what the problem was ?
I needed to add the moparscape client into my source folder LMAOOOO !

But anyway , this forum is bretty lame . Because here is full of smart guys and noone are EVEN bothering to help …

But anyways thanks to Laurenz ( Belgian Pk3r ) Who helped me out
